name: DMP EBOX Product Categories
description: Product category list for DMP EBOX embedded and industrial solutions.

itemListElement.name: Intel BOX PC
itemListElement.description: Rugged, fanless Intel processors embedded PCs for industrial and automation use.

itemListElement.name: Vortex86DX3 VESA PC
itemListElement.description: Compact-sized Vortex86DX3 PCs ideal for digital signage, edge computing, and IoT.

itemListElement.name: Vortex86MX+ VESA PC
itemListElement.description: Low-power embedded PCs based on Vortex86MX+ processors, suitable for legacy applications and industrial automation.

itemListElement.name: Vortex86EX VESA PC
itemListElement.description: A low-cost and power-efficient embedded system.

itemListElement.name: ARM VESA PC
itemListElement.description: A small form factor fanless embedded PC based on NXP i.MX8M Mini ARM Cortex-A53 processor.

itemListElement.name: Peripherals
